2835.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_INDEPENDENT_SERVICE_TEMPORARILY
2835.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2835.short_description: Your console is temporarily banned from this service.
2835.long_description: Your console has been temporarily banned from this service for breaking the rules.
2835.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire.
2835.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
